Text.Page:
You've attended all the events.

It's time for Seir's speech.
With the dragons' assault on the city, the banquet came to a horrific end, marked by ruins and ashes. Just before the great Black Dragon struck its final blow, Mystel sent you back to the past.

The Goddess...! Velika...!

What are all these dragons...?

What's happening?

Where did all these dragons come from?

Something's wrong...

The Veil! The wall between worlds! It's gone!

Something is very, very wrong...!

I'll get these people to safety, then I'll bring back some troops.

, please search the area to see if there are any more survivors. Be careful.

The Goddess is... never mind that for now. Just be quick, and be safe.

Did everyone... make it out?

I hope... the other Palace Knights are... safe...

I think it's better this way... so I won't be around to see things get even worse...

That enormous Black Dragon...that dragon is controlling all the other dragons.
You must... find it! The Master of the Darkened...

What? The banquet? That's still three days away...

Everything's going smoothly. We just got a shipment of fresh ingredients from all over the land, and the chef is hard at work on the menu. I think that's all for now...

I don't know. You should wipe off the dust though.

You came to meet Seir, right? He's inside.
